# maximumValueAccessory

**Instance Property**

The accessory that appears at the end of the slider with the maximum value.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maximumValueAccessory: NSSliderAccessory? { get set }
```

## Configuring slider accessories

- **minimumValueAccessory**: The accessory that appears at the end of the slider with the minimum value.
- **valueAccessoryWidth**: The width of the value accessories that appear at either end of the slider.
